title: Archilocator
subtitle: Finding Interesting Architecture Near You
text: A web application for categorizing specific types and styles of architecture using a React front-end with Google Maps API integration tied to REST endpoints from a Mongo Database.

title: The Wages of Space
subtitle: Unity Engine Lunar Lander Clone
text: A 2D game using Unity's built in physics where a player tries to ferry passengers while balancing fuel and maintenance

title: Craig Schumacher
subtitle: A Portfolio of a DFW Area Artist

title: Blue Boomerang
subtitle: A Game Built for Ludum Dare 33
text: Top down stealth game in the Unity Engine with pathfinding and artificial intelligence. Built in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare game Jam
